maabac
Class AbstractMember

java.lang.Object
  environnement.AbstractContraintesSolitaire
      maabac.AbstractMember
All Implemented Interfaces:
Contraintes, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Arm3, ArmFromAbstract, ArmN
public abstract class AbstractMember
extends AbstractContraintesSolitaire

A (abstract) member is an assembly of muscles, with one free end (the member position), which tries to reach a target

See Also:

whoWins

public int whoWins(State s)
Description copied from interface: Contraintes
Who won ?
  • Two-players game :
    • Player One : -1
    • Tie : 0
    • Player Two : 1
  • Single-player game :
    • Win : -1
    • Null: 0
    • Loose: 1
